casebody.data:
Second Department,

October, 1953.

(October 5, 1953.) Brooklyn Fire Brick Works, Inc., Appellant, v. James W. Clark et al., Respondents.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division denied, with $10 costs. Present — Adel, Acting P. J., Wenzel, MacCrate, Schmidt and Beldock, JJ.
